content: Nice article, but I’m saddened by the “normalization” of the idea that “spy agencies” are routinely (and aggressively, and enthusiastically) spying on their country’s own citizens! It wasn’t so long ago that this fact (I think I can safely call it a FACT now) inspired horror and outrage; now it’s, “Yeah, what did you expect?” All the Hollywood spy movies and TV series have achieved their purpose: to grow calluses on Americans’ minds.
